Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: latisha
Reviews.Content: great product. great to use. its different for those who are use to pc's(thats the only bad thing is switching) but it was in very good condition. the seller even sent a purple case with the product. wonderful thanks for the business hope to use you soon

Reviews.Title: As advertised! Plus more!
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Computer was in great shape and came just as advertised in the description. Excellent software additions.Battery in very good health and the power is adapter just as healthy.Minimal wear and tear. Fast and peppy! A 2010 computer that can keep up with the best of the newest models.Frankly, I'm surprised someone was disciplined enough to keep this machine in such good shape. Kudos to this seller.

ProductInfo.Name: 13.3" Apple MacBook White Unibody 2.4GHz Core 2 Duo 8GB RAM 250GB HD MC516LL/A
